ComicInfo.Summary:
The Alienist debuts in the latest issue of 2000 AD – out on Wednesday from all good Thrill-merchants! In this week’s edition of the Galaxy’s Greatest Comic: Judge Dredd – Enceladus; Old Life by Rob Williams, Henry Flint, and Annie Parkhouse; Jaegir: Tartarus by Gordon Rennie, Simon Coleby, Len O’Grady, and Ellie De Ville; Helium by Ian Edginton, D’Israeli, and Ellie De Ville; Outlier: Dark Symmetries by TC Eglington, Karl Richardson and Annie Parkhouse; and The Alienist: The Haunting of Hex House by Gordon Rennie, Emma Beeby, Eoin Coveney, and Simon Bowland!
Cover: Cliff Robinson
Judge Dredd - Enceladus (Part Five) (Rob Williams - Henry Flint)Helium (Part Eleven) (Ian Edginton - D'Israeli)The Alienist - The Haunting of Hex House (Part One) (Gordon Rennie - Emmy Beeby - Eoin Coveney)Outlier - Dark Symmetries (Part Ten) (T C Eglington - Karl Richardson)Jaegir - Tartarus (Part Eight) (Gordon Rennie - Simon Coleby)
ComicInfo.Title: Prog 1944
ComicInfo.Writer: Emmy Bebby,Gordon Rennie,Ian Edginton,Rob Williams,T.C. Eglington
